name: DARK ASTRAL
description:
DARK ASTRAL is a 2D action-adventure platform game with fast-paced combat, world exploration, multiple levels, and addictive gameplay set in an underworld filled with demons and all sorts of creatures.

The game is a 2D platformer with RPG elements. Explore levels, fight enemies and determine your destiny.

Game Features:
- Nice pixel graphics
- Lots of levels and enemies
- Good soundtrack
